entities.description: Risk of using cocaine once or twice a week, assessed by level of perceived risk.
Risk of having five or more drinks once or twice a week, assessed by level of perceived risk.
Risk of having four or five drinks nearly every day, assessed by level of perceived risk.
Difficulty in obtaining marijuana if desired, assessed by level of perceived difficulty.

relationships.description: Indicates the level of risk perceived by the respondent regarding using cocaine once or twice a week.
Indicates the level of risk perceived by the respondent regarding having five or more drinks once or twice a week.
Indicates the level of risk perceived by the respondent regarding having four or five drinks nearly every day.
Indicates the level of difficulty perceived by the respondent regarding obtaining marijuana if desired.
